full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DNGOS GRUB KUN 'BYUNG SKYA RENGS DKAR PO ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @011A *, ,(DNGOS GRUB KUN 'BYUNG SKYA RENGS DKAR PO ZHES BYA BA 'DI MCHE GROGS SEMS CHE BKA' BCU PA DANG, NGAG DBANG BSTAN 'DZIN NYIS KA GZHAN LA PHAN BSAM GYI SOG YUL 'DIR DKAR ME LHA MCHOD CING GA-YANG BLANG BAS BKRA SHIS 'BYUNG 'DUG KYANG LHA BSKYED PA MCHOD PA BYIN RLABS SOGS MED PA'I POG YIG TSIG LTAD CAN GYI LUGS 'DZIN PA 'GA' SNANG MDO, RANG RE LA BSKYED PA'I ME MCHOD ZHIG BYED DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA'I NGOR MCHOG SAR SBYIN SREG GI THAB BSKYED SANG, SLOB DPON PADMA'I MDZOD PA'I GA-YANG 'GUGS CHEN PO'I GA-YANG 'GUGS BYED KYI 'GA' @011B ZHIG BSDUS NAS 'BYAMS PA NGAG DBANG BSOD NAMS KYIS MDZAD PA'I STENG DUNG DU NYER SPYOD LNGA SPEL TSIG DANG BCAS LUG GI BRANG DANG MAR KHU DANG CHANG MCHOD 'BUL SOGS NI NOM CHI KO CIG SHRI CHOS BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN GYIS SUG BRIS PA'O, , 'DI LTAR BGYIS PA'I NONGS PA CI MCHIS PA BLA MA LHA LA BSHAGS SHING BZOD PAR GSOL, , LEGS CHA TZUD MCHIS PA'I GANG THOB DGES, 'GRO BA RNAMS LA PHAN PA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG, , BKRA SHIS, ,)
